mutants.original_line: return sorted(nums, key=lambda x: (abs(x - median), x))
mutants.mutated_line: return sorted(nums, key=lambda x: (abs(x + median), x))

mutants.original_line: return sorted(nums, key=lambda x: (abs(x - median), x))
mutants.mutated_line: return sorted(nums, key=lambda x: (abs(x * median), x))
